title: JOHN FRIEDA FULL REPAIR Style Revival Heat-Activated Styling Spray
description: Our breakthrough styling spray, with lightweight Inca Inchi Oil, adds manageability, body and flexible hold to any style. Works with heat tools to create shiny, versatile styles that last all day. Helps protect against breakage from high-heat damage. Safe for Color-Treated and Chemically Treated Hair

title: Trind Natural Nail Repair
description: The nail is made out of 3 layers of protein molecules, connected to each other by Natural Moisturizers. They make the nail supple. In the perfect nail you find 82% of protein-molecules and 18% of Natural Moisturizers. Most nail hardeners will just glue the protein-molecules together, leaving no space for the natural moisturizers, and nails become brittle as a result. Trind Nail Repair tightens the protein-molecules while leaving space for the natural moisturizers leaving nails stronger and healthier.

title: HOT TOOLS 2108 Nano Ceramic Marcel Curling Iron, Black/Purple, 1 Inch
description: HOT TOOLS 1 inch ceramic marcel iron (HT2108) ceramic, seals the hair cuticle, retains hair's natural moisture and destroys odors. It produces far infrared heat that is kinder to hair. Styles hair without damage by heating it from the inside out. Hair is shiny and healthy after use. All the benefits of HOT TOOLS' gets hot stays hot performance combined with ceramic's shine enhancing properties and titanium's hardness, high heat tolerance and resistance to corrosion. Separate on and off switch allows the rheostat to inch stay at inch your favorite heat setting marcel iron features. Locking rotating marcel handle touch guard protector.

title: Redken Wax Blast 10 High Impact Finishing Spray Wax, 4.4 Ounce
description: Spray on perfectly undone texture. Aerosol wax adds body and dimension with a choppy, satin-matte finish and creates rebellious styles.

title: Orly Nail Rescue Kit
description: Orly's Nail Rescue Kit provides quick and easy repair of cracked or broken nails in 3 easy steps. Nail are flawlessly repaired with long-lasting result.

title: Too Faced Natural Radiance Face Palette, 0.65 Ounce
description: Our multi-tasking face palette contains everything you need to create a warm, all-over glow. A thoughtfully selected assortment of natural, sun-kissed shades delivers a healthy, no-makeup look that is irresistibly sexy.

title: EcoTools Bamboo 6 Mini Brushes 1223
description: Ecotool's earth-friendly brushes show respect for the planet.

title: NYX Cosmetics Butt Naked Makeup Palette
description: Buy NYX Cosmetics Makeup Kits & Makeup Eye Shadow Palettes - NYX Cosmetics Butt Naked Makeup Palette

title: Zoya Nail Polish Pixie Dust Fall - 2013 Edition (Carter-ZP701)
description: Infused with even more magic and wonder! Because everyone wants more of it... The color experts at Zoya went back to the lab and created six more beautiful, long-wearing textured, matte and sparkle Zoya PixieDust Colors for Fall 2013! The incredible and best-selling formula is sure to captivate with a magical sparkle and sugary finish like no other.

title: Benefit Cosmetics erase paste concealer - dark 03
description: Signs of stress & fatigue are a thing of the past with this innovative formula. This concentrated, creamy, blendable concealer instantly brightens & camouflages all-in-one. The three brightening neutral shades give every gal correction perfection.

title: Real Techniques Expert Face Brush
description: Designed with pro makeup artist Samantha Chapman, Real Techniques brushes combine high-tech materials with innovative design to make creating a pixel-perfect look easier than ever: Taklon bristles are ultra plush and smoother than the hair you'll find in other brushes. Since taklon is synthetic, it's 100% cruelty-free. The soft fibers help create a flawless, high-definition finish in any type of light, from sunlight to harsh indoor lighting. The color-coded system corresponds to the key steps of makeup application so you can create a flawless base (copper), enhanced eyes (purple), and the perfect finish like a pro (pink). Each brush head is hand-cut to the perfect shape, allowing for precise application from dense coverage to a soft, delicate finish. The collection is suitable for a wide range of products and every makeup need – from powders, creams, and liquids to mineral makeup, highlighter, and shimmer. Brush names on the handles make for easy reference when creating your favorite look.

title: Coty Airspun Loose Powder, Naturelle, 2.3 Ounce
description: This ultra smooth powder hides tiny lines, wrinkles and blemishes and gives a new softness to your skin

title: Garnier Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream, Grape Water Extract, Vitamin E,  1.70-Fluid Ounce
description: Through collaboration with dermatologists and nutritionists, garnier has developed nutritioniste with "skin-nutrients", targeted to help your skin stay healthy looking and beautiful, day after day. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture for 24 hours, blocks out dryness. A light, oil free, gel-cream texture penetrates deeply into skin's upper layers so that skin looks and feels soft and smooth. Garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream is dermatologist tested for safety; non comedogenic - won't clog pores; gentle to skin; allergy tested; non-greasy.how is it different? Garnier nutritioniste moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture and blocks out dryness using a formula with a unique combination of pure antioxidant fruit water extracts and skin conditioning. Its ultra-lightweight, oil-free, refreshing gel-cream formula instantly penetrates for long-lasting moisture and boosts skin's defenses as it holds moisture for 24 hours. "skin-nutrient" facts - moisture rescue with: grape water extract: antioxidant power defends skin from external aggressors; vitamin e: soothes and conditions skin. Results - instantly: skin looks and feels supple and smooth. In 1 hour skin's moisture barrier is strengthened to prevent dryness. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.

title: Beauty Aura 100 % Pure Castor Oil. Pressed From Best Quality Castor Seeds (16 Fl Oz)
description: Beauty Aura pure Castor oil is  pressed from castor seeds. It has antiviral, antibacterial, antifungal and emollient properties. Condition: Minor skin problems, dry skin & dull hair in need of natural remedy and moisturizing. Solution: The Omega-9 fatty acid in Castor oil works to inhibit many viruses and bacteria making it an effective treatment for acne. Regular use may help minimize fine lines and wrinkles, reduce dark circles and under eye bags, heal scars and fade stretch marks promoting skin suppleness. It is useful in treating minor skin infections like athlete’s foot etc. Rubbing a little castor oil over the brow line may help thicken sparse eyebrows. Regular gentle massages may help relieve arthritis and back pain. Castor oil has lots of benefits in hair care. It nourishes hair and prevents the scalp from drying. The anti-bacterial and anti-fungicidal properties of castor oil help protect the scalp from infections that can cause hair loss. Regular massages also serve as an effective dandruff treatment.

title: It Cosmetics Bye Bye Under Eye Full Coverage Waterproof Concealer, Deep
description: Working hand in hand with the leading plastic surgeons in Brazil, Bye Bye Under Eye was created as a full coverage, highly pigmented anti-aging concealer that utilizes truly innovative technology and ingredients - giving women the power to finally say "bye –bye!" to stubborn under-eye issues. Bye Bye Under Eye offers a waterproof, yet moisturizing, formula that stays put no matter what. The truly innovative formula contains high concentrations of Vitamins K, A, C, E and Collagen, which are clinically proven to reduce under eye puffiness and discoloration while strengthening the delicate skin of the under eye area. More than just full coverage for under the eyes, this formula was developed, tested and is now used to conceal facial bruising and swelling on the face and body of surgery patients in the offices of some of the leading plastic surgeons in Brazil. Hypo-allergenic and non-comedogenic. How to Use: Apply to bare skin, underneath foundation. Set with powder if preferred. Remove with facial cleanser or makeup remover.
